112.content:
As Mina was walking down the shopping district, she happened upon a new store that she hadn't seen before. It was a new costume shop, but that was an odd time and place for it. It was in the middle of nowhere and the last time she checked, the calender said November, not October. Then, she happened to spy a particularly wonderful costume that would look great on her if she ever became an idol. She looked at her current duds; a canary yellow long sleeve shirt and a maroon skirt overalls and thought how caddy those looked compared to that dress. Without further hesitation, she walked into the shop.

The bell wrung ominously as she entered. As the door closed behind her, Mina looked into the vastness of the empty clothing store.

"Hello?" Mina called out, but there was no answer. She took a couple of steps further and suddenly from nowhere a sign popped out. Mina jumped back startled, but the sign seemed to give off a most harmless glow to it. Mina looked carefully at the sign and read:

"Welcome to the Changerific Emporium!!! Need a change to your clothing? No problem! Need to gain or lose a few pounds? Why wait on food? Want to lose a few years to catch that guy you've been thinking about? Well, have we got a place for you! The clothing on display will help to change your life forever, while the rooms along the wall will help you find the persona or figure you've been dying for. And for being our first customer, you get a free trial day for free! No charges, no waiting and best of all no hassle. So feel free to participate in whatever you like, and have a pleasant day!"

Mina scowled. This seemed to good to be true. A "Changerific Emporium" that would change herself? All she wanted was to see how much that dress cost. But as she looked around in the store, she noticed many clothing that wouldn't seem to fit in a store like this. And in the back there seemed to be several doors labeled with words such as "Age", "Gender" and "Height"

"It is for free..." Mina said to herself and decided to...

11221.content:
*authors note: Guys if I get the fundamentals on the character wrong, feel free to correct me, thank you*

Mina entered into the room to find nothing but a small area filled with wall mirrors that surround what appeared to be a circular pad with a touch screen computer rising from the floor next to it.

Cautiously she meandered to the computer and proceeded to look at the blank screen. Then, a womanly monotone voice called out from no where.

"Welcome visitor. Please state your name and current age."

Mina stared around and noticed no P.A. system anywhere. Then, the floor space next to her shimmered and a brunette woman, roughly the same age as Mina, in a one piece body suit appeared as if from nowhere.

"Hello. My name is Giselle. Welcome to the Changerific Emporiums age chamber.Did you have a particular age you wished to be?"

"P...pardon?"

"An age dear. Did you read the sign?" Giselle said, giggling at Mina's surprise, "My master built this place for people to be able to enjoy themselves for their own benefits, while also marveling in the powers of Science".

"And you are...?"

"I'm Giselle" Giselle said as a matter of factly, "I am an organic creation of my master to assist those in the emporium while they are here". She then noticed as Mina began to poke the flesh of Giselles arm. Giselle, shivering, stepped back, "Wha...what are you doing?"

"Hmmm? Oh! I'm sorry, I thought you were a hologram or something" Mina replied apologeticly.

"A holo..."Giselle started, but then suddenly broke out into laughing. Mina stared at the laughing girl, thinking she must have lost it, but Giselle composed herself and said, "A hologram? I'm so sorry, but I can understand your confusion now. My master created me from his own DNA and another female construct. My sisters and I are all that remain here".

"You're sisters?"

"They work in the other rooms, but we all meet together in one room upstairs, sort of like a living quarters if you will. Our goal, before the Master left to expand his work, is to make people happy and assist them in any way possible", Giselle continued.

"So you're not with the Negaverse?" Mina asked.

Giselle blinked for a moment, "I'm sorry dear. Nega-what?"

So...it's not a trap then...Mina thought as she stared at the console in front of her. As she continued to stare, she seemed to notice that Giselle was staring at her curiously and decided to change the subject, "So...what's this do again?"

"Oh, this. My master created it to help people feel at the peak of their healths, or to take a glimpse into the future. Or, should the need arise, they could have themselves relaxing as their old selves, but with a younger state of mind. I am in charge to assist them in that endeavor, and care for them should the need arise" Giselle explained.

"Care?" Mina asked.

"My master thought that some people would have liked to press, as he called it, the reset button and just do it all over again. Mind you, I'm not sure what it means", Giselle said.

"What do you mean? You were a child once too, right?" Mina asked.

Giselle looked down rather glumly, "No,though I know the definition of child. My master created us at a very specific age group. We can age as normal people do, but we've spent the majority of our lives as teens...never children".

How awful...Mina thought...to never have experienced the joy of being a child.

Thinking to herself, Mina suddenly had an idea and proceeded onto the platform. Instantly the computer activated and several on-screen buttons flared to life.

"Ah! Wait!" Giselle cried before Mina could so much as touch one of the buttons, "Before you press anything, safety procedure calls us to document the subjects name and age before any transformations can be completed

"Oh!" Mina said, "I guess that was rude on my part. My name is Mina Aino, age 16"

A notepad appeared as if from nowhere and Giselle caught it and scribbled it down. "This is just in case something should go wrong and we would need return you to normal".

"Hasn't this ever been tested?"

"Oh yes. The first test subjects died very horribly, sometimes even going so far as unbirth, but my master has fixed the kinks on it, and the safeties are always active. We would never allow the death of anyone in this facility", Giselle said very seriously.

"You're sure?" Mina asked skeptically.

As Giselle nodded, Mina proceeded with her plan to become...

113.content:
Serena was bored.

Simply put, she had no idea what she was going to do that afternoon. She was supposed to be studying for the upcoming math test, but she just couldn't focus on the paper. Her thoughts quickly turned to Darien and what he was possibly doing at that moment in time. What could she possibly do to impress him?

That's when the phone rang. Serena heard her mother pick it up, and the next thing she knew, she had called up to her saying it was one of her friends.

"Who could be calling me?" Serena asked herself, heading to the upstairs phone, "Amy is working on the same test I am, Raye is working at the temple, Mina...I'm not sure what she's up to, could be her, and didn't Lita have a game today, I'm sure she did".

When she answered the phone, it was in fact Raye who made the call, "Serena! You'll never believe this! I just scored two tickets for me and Lita to go see the newest boy band group that just came out!"

"What?! But I was hoping to go too!" Serena said.

"Well, you might be able to make it. The tickets haven't sold out quite yet, but you'd better hurry, Meatball head!" And with that, Raye hung up.

Steaming, Serena slammed the receiver on the hook. She didn't have the funding to get into that kind of a big show, and for that matter, she didn't think her mom would financially back her up this time, considering what happened on the last math test. And how could she forget about how she was going to impress Darien?! This was worse than taking that stupid test.

Then, it hit her. She had it in her pocket the whole time! She'd use the disguise pen; she could practically do anything with that. The question was...what would she do?
113.title: Moon

info.brief_description: It was about time...for the transforming adventures of the sailor scouts and others.
info.description:
The Sailor Scouts, their allies and possibly even their villains are changing for better or for worse. How is all up to you with the various choices you can use, such as:

AP/AR (mental or physical)
Shrinking
Growing
Transgender
Transformations
Weight gain

Anything you want can happen to these gals/guys/animals. All you have to do...is make it real...
